title: XFROG phase measurement of threshold harmonics in a Keldysh-scaled system
title_cn: 凯氏定标系统中阈值谐波的XFROG相位测量
abstract: Attosecond pulses are created (by Fourier synthesis) from a comb of odd-order high harmonics resulting from the non-perturbative interaction of intense near-visible laser light with an atomic gas. When produced by a mid-infrared laser, harmonics can have simultaneously high order, visible wavelength, and photon energy below the ionization threshold, Ip, of the generating atom. Methods requiring photon energies greater than Ip have been developed that measure the spectral amplitude and phase necessary for temporal reconstruction of the harmonic radiation. Here we report the temporal characterization of below-threshold harmonics using sum frequency generation cross-correlation frequency resolved optical gating (SFG XFROG), a technique sensitive to the relative delay between orders, coupled with a novel approach that makes use of the Keldysh scaling in strong-field physics. The results surprisingly suggest non-perturbative generation of below threshold harmonics, providing a potential alternative to existing vacuum–ultraviolet frequency comb generation methods.
abstract_cn: 阿托秒脉冲是通过梳状奇数次高次谐波产生的（通过傅立叶合成），该次谐波是由强烈的近可见激光与原子气体的非扰动相互作用引起的。当由中红外激光产生时，谐波可以同时具有高阶，可见光波长和低于产生原子的电离阈值I p 的光子能量。已经开发出需要光子能量大于I p 的方法，该方法测量谐波辐射的时间重建所必需的光谱幅度和相位。在这里，我们使用总频率生成互相关频率分辨光学门控（SFG XFROG）报告了阈值以下谐波的时间特征，该技术对阶次之间的相对延迟敏感，并结合了一种新颖的方法，该方法利用了Keldysh标度强场物理学。结果令人惊讶地表明，低于阈值谐波的非扰动产生，为现有的真空紫外频率梳产生方法提供了潜在的替代方法。

title: Experimental quantum-enhanced estimation of a lossy phase shift
title_cn: 有损相移的实验量子增强估计
abstract: A paradigm for quantum-enhanced precision metrology is found in optical interferometry, which is capable of sensing diverse physical quantities through measurement of a phase shift. When standard light sources are used, the precision of the phase determination is limited by shot noise, the origin of which can be traced to the random manner in which individual photons emerge from the interferometer. Quantum entanglement provides a means to exceed this limit with the celebrated example of N00N states, which saturate the ultimate Heisenberg limit on precision, but are extremely fragile to losses. In contrast, we present experimental evidence that appropriately engineered quantum states outperform both standard and N00N states in the precision of phase estimation when losses are present. This shows that the quantum enhancement of metrology is possible even when decoherence is present, and that the strategy for realizing the enhancement is quite distinct from protecting quantum information encoded in light.
abstract_cn: 在光学干涉术中发现了一种用于量子增强的精密计量的范例，该范例能够通过测量相移来感测各种物理量。当使用标准光源时，相位确定的精度受到散粒噪声的限制，散粒噪声的起源可以追溯到各个光子从干涉仪中发出的随机方式。量子纠缠提供了一种以著名的N00N状态示例超出该限制的方法，该状态使Heisenberg的极限精度达到极限，但极易损坏。相比之下，我们提供的实验证据表明，当存在损耗时，经过适当设计的量子态在相位估计的精度方面优于标准态和N00N态。这表明即使存在退相干，计量学的量子增强也是可能的，并且实现增强的策略与保护以光编码的量子信息完全不同。</ p>

title: Exciton–polariton spin switches
abstract: Integrated switching devices comprise the building blocks of ultrafast optical signal processing. As the next stage following intensity switching, circular polarization switches are attracting considerable interest because of their applications in spin-based architectures. They usually take advantage of nonlinear optical effects, and require high powers and external optical elements. Semiconductor microcavities provide a significant step forward due to their low-threshold, polarization-dependent, nonlinear emission, fast operation and integrability. Here, we demonstrate a non-local, all-optical spin switch based on exciton–polaritons in a semiconductor microcavity. In the presence of a sub-threshold pump laser (dark regime), a tightly localized probe induces the switch-on of the entire pumped area. If the pump is circularly polarized, the switch is conditional on the polarization of the probe, but if it is linearly polarized, a circularly polarized probe fully determines the final polarization of the pumped area. These results set the basis for the development of spin-based logic devices, integrated in a chip.
abstract_cn: 集成的开关设备构成了超快速光信号处理的基础。作为强度转换之后的下一阶段，圆偏振开关由于其在基于自旋的体系结构中的应用而引起了极大的兴趣。它们通常利用非线性光学效应，并需要高功率和外部光学元件。半导体微腔具有低阈值，偏振相关，非线性发射，快速运行和可集成性，因此向前迈出了重要的一步。在这里，我们演示了一种基于微激子中激子极化子的非局部全光自旋开关。在亚阈值泵浦激光器（暗状态）的存在下，紧密定位的探头会引起整个泵浦区域的接通。如果泵是圆极化的，则该开关取决于探针的极化，但是如果是线性极化的，则圆极化的探针将完全确定泵浦区域的最终极化。这些结果为集成在芯片中的基于自旋的逻辑器件的开发奠定了基础。</ p>

title: Ultrafast optical spin echo in a single quantum dot
title_cn: 单量子点中的超快光学自旋回波
abstract: Many proposed photonic quantum networks rely on matter qubits to serve as memory elements. The spin of a single electron confined in a semiconductor quantum dot forms a promising matter qubit that may be interfaced with a photonic network. Ultrafast optical spin control allows gate operations to be performed on the spin within a picosecond timescale, orders of magnitude faster than microwave or electrical control. One obstacle to storing quantum information in a single quantum dot spin is the apparent nanosecond-timescale dephasing due to slow variations in the background nuclear magnetic field. Here we use an ultrafast, all-optical spin echo technique to increase the decoherence time of a single quantum dot electron spin from nanoseconds to several microseconds. The ratio of decoherence time to gate time exceeds 105, suggesting strong promise for future photonic quantum information processors and repeater networks.
abstract_cn: 许多提出的光子量子网络都依赖物质量子位来充当存储元件。 限制在半导体量子点中的单个电子的自旋形成可以与光子网络接口的有希望的物质量子位。 超快光学自旋控制允许在皮秒级的时间内在自旋上执行栅极操作，比微波或电控制要快几个数量级。 在单个量子点自旋中存储量子信息的一个障碍是由于背景核磁场的缓慢变化而导致的明显的纳秒时标相移。 在这里，我们使用超快的全光自旋回波技术将单个量子点电子自旋的消相干时间从纳秒增加到几微秒。 退相干时间与选通时间之比超过10 5 ，这为未来的光子量子信息处理器和转发器网络提供了广阔前景。

title: Room-temperature polariton lasing in an organic single-crystal microcavity
title_cn: 有机单晶微腔中的室温极化激射
abstract: The optical properties of organic semiconductors are almost exclusively described using the Frenkel exciton picture. In this description, the strong Coulombic interaction between an excited electron and the charged vacancy it leaves behind (a hole) is automatically taken into account. If, in an optical microcavity, the exciton–photon interaction is strong compared to the excitonic and photonic decay rates, a second quasiparticle, the microcavity polariton, must be introduced to properly account for this coupling. Coherent, laser-like emission from polaritons has been predicted to occur when the ground-state occupancy of polaritons 〈ngs〉, reaches 1 (ref. ). This process, known as polariton lasing, can occur at thresholds much lower than required for conventional lasing. Polaritons in organic semiconductors are highly stable at room temperature, but to our knowledge, there has as yet been no report of nonlinear emission from these structures. Here, we demonstrate polariton lasing at room temperature in an organic microcavity composed of a melt-grown anthracene single crystal sandwiched between two dielectric mirrors.
abstract_cn: 几乎完全使用Frenkel激子图来描述有机半导体的光学特性。在此描述中，将自动考虑激发电子与其留下的带电空位（空穴）之间的强库仑相互作用。如果在光学微腔中，激子和光子的相互作用比激子和光子的衰减速率强，则必须引入第二个准粒子，即微腔极化子，以正确考虑这种耦合。据预测，当极化子的基态占有率达到1时，极化子会产生类似激光的相干发射（参考文献＃160;）。此过程称为极化激射，可以在比常规激射所需的阈值低得多的阈值处发生。有机半导体中的极化子在室温下非常稳定，但是据我们所知，尚未有这些结构产生非线性发射的报道。在这里，我们演示了在有机微腔中的极化激光激射，该微腔是由熔融生长的蒽单晶夹在两个介电镜之间构成的。

title: Experimental free-space quantum teleportation
title_cn: 实验性自由空间量子隐形传态
abstract: Quantum teleportation is central to the practical realization of quantum communication. Although the first proof-of-principle demonstration was reported in 1997 by the Innsbruck and Rome groups, long-distance teleportation has so far only been realized in fibre with lengths of hundreds of metres. An optical free-space link is highly desirable for extending the transfer distance, because of its low atmospheric absorption for certain ranges of wavelength. By following the Rome scheme, which allows a full Bell-state measurement, we report free-space implementation of quantum teleportation over 16 km. An active feed-forward technique has been developed to enable real-time information transfer. An average fidelity of 89%, well beyond the classical limit of 2/3, is achieved. Our experiment has realized all of the non-local aspects of the original teleportation scheme and is equivalent to it up to a local unitary operation. Our result confirms the feasibility of space-based experiments, and is an important step towards quantum-communication applications on a global scale.
abstract_cn: 量子隐形传态对于量子通信的实际实现至关重要。尽管因斯布鲁克和罗马小组在1997年首次报道了原理证明，但到目前为止，远距离传送只在数百米长的光纤中实现。光自由空间链路对于延长传输距离非常有用，因为它在某些波长范围内的大气吸收率低。通过遵循允许进行完整贝尔状态测量的罗马方案，我们报告了在16 km以外的量子隐形传态的自由空间实现。已经开发了一种主动前馈技术以实现实时信息传输。实现了89％的平均保真度，远远超出了2/3的经典限制。我们的实验已经实现了原始隐形传态方案的所有非局部方面，并且等效于局部统一操作。我们的结果证实了空基实验的可行性，并且是在全球范围内向量子通信应用迈出的重要一步。

title: Amplification of long-range surface plasmons by a dipolar gain medium
title_cn: 偶极增益介质对远程表面等离子体激元的放大
abstract: Surface plasmon–polaritions, collective electron oscillations coupled to light waves at the surface of a metal, show unique properties that are valuable in a broad range of scientific fields. However, the intrinsic propagation loss of these waves poses a fundamental problem to many potential applications. To overcome this drawback, researchers have explored the possibility of loss compensation by means of surface plasmon–polarition amplification. Here we provide the first direct measurement of gain in propagating plasmons using the long-range surface plasmon–polariton supported by a symmetric metal stripe waveguide that incorporates optically pumped dye molecules in solution as the gain medium. The measured mode power gain is 8.55 dB mm−1. Furthermore, it is shown that this new class of amplifier benefits from reduced spontaneous emission into the amplified mode, potentially leading to low-noise optical amplification.
abstract_cn: 表面等离子体激元极化是与金属表面光波耦合的集体电子振荡，具有独特的性质，在广泛的科学领域中具有重要价值。 但是，这些波的固有传播损耗给许多潜在应用带来了根本问题。 为克服此缺点，研究人员探索了通过表面等离子体激元极化放大法进行损耗补偿的可能性。 在这里，我们使用由对称金属条纹波导支持的长距离表面等离子体激元提供了对传播等离子体激元中增益的首次直接测量，该对称金属条纹波导将溶液中的光泵浦染料分子合并为增益介质。 测得的模式功率增益为8.55＆＃160; dB＆＃160; mm ＆＃8722; 1 。 此外，结果表明，这种新型放大器受益于自发发射到放大模式的减少，有可能导致低噪声光学放大。

title: In situ wavefront correction and its application to micromanipulation
title_cn: 原位波前校正及其在微处理中的应用
abstract: In any optical system, distortions to a propagating wavefront reduce the spatial coherence of a light field, making it increasingly difficult to obtain the theoretical diffraction-limited spot size. Such aberrations are severely detrimental to optimal performance in imaging, nanosurgery, nanofabrication and micromanipulation, as well as other techniques within modern microscopy. We present a generic method based on complex modulation for true in situ wavefront correction that allows compensation of all aberrations along the entire optical train. The power of the method is demonstrated for the field of micromanipulation, which is very sensitive to wavefront distortions. We present direct trapping with optimally focused laser light carrying power of a fraction of a milliwatt as well as the first trapping through highly turbid and diffusive media. This opens up new perspectives for optical micromanipulation in colloidal and biological physics and may be useful for various forms of advanced imaging.
abstract_cn: 在任何光学系统中，传播波前的畸变都会降低光场的空间相干性，从而越来越难以获得理论上受衍射限制的光斑尺寸。这样的像差严重不利于成像，纳米外科，纳米加工和显微操作以及现代显微镜内的其他技术的最佳性能。我们提出了一种基于复合调制的通用方法，用于真正的原位波前校正，该方法可以补偿整个光学系统中的所有像差。该方法的强大功能在微操纵领域得到了证明，该领域对波前畸变非常敏感。我们介绍了直接捕获，其聚焦功率为毫瓦的几分之一的最佳聚焦激光，以及通过高浊度和扩散性介质的首次捕获。这为胶体和生物物理学中的光学显微操作开辟了新的视角，可能对各种形式的高级成像有用。

title: Room-temperature subwavelength metallo-dielectric lasers
title_cn: 室温亚波长金属介电激光器
abstract: We demonstrate room-temperature pulsed laser emission from optically pumped metallo-dielectric cavities that are smaller than their emission wavelength in all three dimensions. The cavity consists of an aluminium/silica bi-layer shield surrounding an InGaAsP disk in which the thickness of the silica layer is optimized to minimize the gain threshold of the laser. The lasers are pumped using a 1,064-nm pulsed fibre laser with a pulse width of 12 ns and repetition rate of 300 kHz. Lasing emission at 1.43 µm is observed from a laser with slightly elliptical gain core with major and minor diameters of 490 and 420 nm, respectively. Owing to the isolation provided by the aluminium shield, this laser design approach can be used to create arrays of uncoupled lasers with emitter densities that are close to the Rayleigh resolution limit.
abstract_cn: 我们证明了在所有三个维度上，光泵浦金属介电腔的室温脉冲激光发射均小于其发射波长。 空腔由围绕InGaAsP磁盘的铝/二氧化硅双层屏蔽层组成，其中二氧化硅层的厚度已优化，可最大程度地减少激光器的增益阈值。 激光是用1064 nm脉冲光纤激光器泵浦的，脉冲宽度为12ns，重复频率为300kHz。 从具有略微椭圆形增益芯的激光器观察到1.43微米的激光发射，该纤芯的长径和短径分别为490和420nm。 由于铝屏蔽层提供了隔离，因此这种激光器设计方法可用于创建发射器密度接近瑞利分辨率极限的未耦合激光器阵列。
